data.name: Epurery Beauty
data.desc:
2 Level 2 monsters
Once per turn: You can target 1 Effect Monster your opponent controls; negate its effects until the end of this turn. This is a Quick Effect if this card has "Purery Pretty Memory" as material. Thrice per turn, when you activate a "Purery" Quick-Play Spell Card (Quick Effect): You can attach that card on the field to this card as material, then you can change the battle position of 1 monster your opponent controls.
